DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS : SOUTH : USC ; AUTHOR CORNEL WEST WILL GIVE LECTURE
DOC.TEXT: Cornel West , author of the the highly praised book " Race Matters , " will discuss democracy , race and relationships Tuesday at USC ' s Bovard Auditorium . West is director of the African American studies program at Princeton_University . The talk will begin at 7:30 p.m. Admission is $ 10 . Information : ( 213 ) 740-7575 .
